events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and are beginning the review process.
The application was reviewed and categorized under the Engineering cluster based on the candidate's skills in software development and devops.
A recruiter was assigned to handle this candidate's application to ensure smooth communication and scheduling for upcoming interviews.
Conducted the initial screening call with the candidate to evaluate their experience in software engineering and overall fit for the role.
The candidate responded promptly to scheduling requests and confirmed availability for the technical interview next week.
Technical interview was successfully scheduled with the engineering team to assess the candidate's coding and system design skills.
The candidate completed the technical interview with strong performance in problem-solving and practical coding exercises.
Scheduling the HR interview next week to discuss company culture, benefits, and address candidate's questions.
The HR interview was completed with positive feedback regarding the candidate's alignment with our values and expectations.
An employment offer was proposed to the candidate including details on compensation, benefits, and start date.
